324130.name: GRID Autosport - Demoman Derby Pack
324130.description: Download the free Valve Pack now to receive a Team Fortress 2 theme for Demolition Derby mode! Including night racing for the first time in this mode, the Detroit Stadium becomes the ‘Badlands Stadium’ complete with trackside sponsorship from Mann Co. and your other favourite Team Fortress 2 corporations. Represent RED or BLU with two new liveries for the Jupiter Eagleray Mk 5 and crash, smash and bash your way into the night with the action lit up by new floodlights, fireworks, neon signage and more. Once installed, “Demoman Derby” appears as a new Party Mode for Online or Offline Custom Cups!
324130.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 日语*, 波兰语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 已启用 Valve 反作弊保护
